message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly benefit your endeavors. For this unique opportunity, I propose a special introductory price of $14,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an outstanding value considering the product's true worth of $15,000. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can enhance your operations.
